name: mastra-a2a-distributed-system
description: Distributed A2A (Agent-to-Agent) communication system using Mastra's native A2A protocol

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:research" "npm run dev:writing" "npm run dev:analysis" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:research: cd research-agent && PORT=4111 npm run dev
scripts.dev:writing: cd writing-agent && PORT=4112 npm run dev
scripts.dev:analysis: cd analysis-agent && PORT=4113 npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd research-agent && npm install && cd ../writing-agent && npm install && cd ../analysis-agent && npm install && cd ../gateway-agent && npm install && cd ../a2a-frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd research-agent && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../writing-agent && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../analysis-agent && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../gateway-agent && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../a2a-frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.test: echo "Testing A2A system..." && curl -s http://localhost:3001/health | jq . || echo "Gateway not running"
scripts.status: echo "Checking server status..." && lsof -i :3000,3001,4111,4112,4113 || echo "No servers running"

author: Your Name
